sentences.english: You can’t do a calculus class without first taking (and understanding) an Algebra and a Trigonometry class.
sentences.chinese: 沒有三角學和代數學的知識你不會理解微積分。

sentences.english: He found books on trigonometry in the mathematics section.
sentences.chinese: 他在數學書的部門找到一些三角學的書？

sentences.english: Right, you're gonna teach me trig ?
He received a low mark for trigonometry.
